name: Sprite Labs
tag_list: ios, photo, video, education, apps, iphone, ipad
overview:
Sprite Labs is a privately held self-funded and profitable company, bringing entertainment and educational applications that delight users with a blend of superior technology and creative arts. Since its inception, Sprite Labs has had several iOS apps featured by Apple on the iTunes App Store and some have maintained top ranks for more than two years.

Founded in the Silicon Valley in July of 2009 by two techies, graduates in Computer Science and alums of Electronic Visualization Laboratory (EVL) , the pioneering lab in 3D Graphics and Virtual Reality, followed by 10+ years of software developement in silicon valley in the areas of 3D/2D Graphics, Image Processing and Cloud technologies.

Sprite Labs has been profitable since 3 months of it’s inception. Sprite Labs has a growing team of motivated developers, 3D Animators/Modelers and 2D designers, who believe in weaving tech with art to create memorable experiences.
